projects.title: LLMs Project
projects.description: This project involves building a large language model from scratch, with core components developed independently and later fine-tuned using lit-GPT for improved performance.

projects.title: Weather and Energy Efficiency Prediction Project
projects.description: This project involves building a model to help predict weather conditions and energy efficiency using current weather API and NYC historical data.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This website is made with React and Tailwind CSS, and uses JSON data to display my information. This website is deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: To Do Application Project using React
projects.description: This is a small project made with React to help me learn about the basics of React framework.

projects.title: Custom Web Application Project
projects.description: This website contains features like user authentication, post creation, deletion, and add friend functionality. It was built using .NET, C#, SQLite, Bootstrap, RESTful API, JavaScript, and Vue.js.

projects.title: To Do Game Project
projects.description: This is my first ever project made with Ruby and Gosu. This app combines the functionality of a to-do application with a fun twist. With this app, users can earn coins each time they complete a task. It offers the basic features of task management, allowing users to create and delete tasks.
